name: Battle Bug
description:
The world is not a simple place. It is not white or black, but not just any other color either. Worlds at all scales have their own duality and cannot be seen only from one side. It is no different even in the world of bugs. In the world, every element is both good and bad. Good for some and bad for others, yet each of them is bad for the world and good for the world as a whole. You are the bug, and your job is in the fight - fight against the evil. But... Who is evil? Other bugs? Game draws from the genre of late twentieth century fighting games and adds a flash game theme to it. If you like games from arcade machines = you are going to love that!

Controls:

1st player

WSAD, left ctrl.

2nd player

arrows, right ctrl

Game was made solo by one person without usage of 3rd party assets (everything was done by one person during time of jam).

Orginally was made on KrakJam 2022 as part of Global Game Jam 2022.

https://globalgamejam.org/2022/games/battle-bug-9

With this jam my goal was to make a game copleatly by myself - no cc by or cc0 resources and no asset help from other people. I have even made sounds and songs :D
